name: Shah Nawaz
headline: Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Computer Vision | AI
about: Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Software Engineering at Daffodil International University, with a specialization in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and computer vision. As a Machine Learning Developer at DIU, contributed to creating an image classification model using CNNs in TensorFlow, achieving 92% accuracy, and implementing object detection with OpenCV and YOLO for real-time applications, reducing processing time by 30%. Collaborated with peers to automate data preprocessing pipelines, enhancing efficiency by 25% and enabling scalable AI solutions. Participated in DIU's 4th Data Summit 2024, engaging with industry leaders to explore the intersection of AI and healthcare applications. Motivated to leverage AI expertise to address real-world challenges and drive innovation within collaborative, multidisciplinary teams. ‚Ä¶ more Activity 352 followers Posts Comments Videos Images Shah Nawaz ‚Ä¢ 2nd Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Computer Vision | AI 1d ‚Ä¢ üì¢ Proud to Announce a New Leadership Role I am pleased to share that I have been promoted to Vice President of the Data Science Club at Daffodil International University (DIU). This opportunity marks an important step in my journey in AI, Machine Learning, and Data Science, and I‚Äôm honored to contribute at a leadership level. In this role, I aim to: üîπ Support students and members in advancing their technical skills üîπ Facilitate hands-on workshops, projects, and research activities üîπ Strengthen collaboration between academia and industry üîπ Promote innovation and responsible AI practices within our community Thank you to the faculty advisors, club executive board, mentors, and peers who trusted me with this responsibility. I‚Äôm excited for what‚Äôs ahead. ‚Ä¶ more Starting a new position 10 reactions 10 1 comment Like Comment Repost Send Shah Nawaz ‚Ä¢ 2nd Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Computer Vision | AI 1mo ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ üöÄ Bringing Explainability to AI-Based Brain Tumor Diagnosis After months of research, I‚Äôm excited to share the demo of my system ‚Äî ‚ÄúExplainable Brain Tumor Diagnosis using ResNet ‚Ä¢ ViT ‚Ä¢ ResViT.‚Äù This project compares three powerful architectures ‚Äî ResNet-50, Vision Transformer (ViT-B/16), and our hybrid ResViT model ‚Äî for classifying MRI brain scans into glioma, meningioma, and pituitary/other tumors. üß† The most exciting part? Each prediction is explainable through Grad-CAM heatmaps, letting us visualize where the model focuses when identifying tumors ‚Äî a major step toward transparent and trustworthy medical AI. üéØ Built with PyTorch, Streamlit, and TensorBoard, this tool enables real-time inference and comparative visualization across multiple deep learning models. üìò Next Step: Expanding this into my another undergraduate thesis titled: ‚ÄúHybrid Deep Learning with Multi-Head Cross-Attention for Explainable Brain Tumor Diagnosis on Mobile Devices.‚Äù üé• Watch the full demo below üëá #AI #DeepLearning #ExplainableAI #BrainTumor #MedicalImaging #GradCAM #ComputerVision #Research #PyTorch #Streamlit #ViT #ResNet #ResViT #HealthcareAI #Innovation #MachineLearning ‚Ä¶ more This is a modal window. No compatible source was found for this media. 20 reactions 20 2 comments Like Comment Repost Send Shah Nawaz ‚Ä¢ 2nd Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Computer Vision | AI 2mo ‚Ä¢ üé• I built a Lung CT SCAN Classifier ‚Äî and made it usableüé• I just finished an end-to-end pipeline to classify Lung CT images into Normal / Benign / Malignant, compare three backbones side-by-side, and explain predictions with Grad-CAM‚Äîall wrapped in a Streamlit app. I also recorded a short screen-capture demo testing a single model and then comparing all three. üé•What I actually builtüé• 1.Backbones: ResNet50 (CNN), ViT-B/16 (Transformer), and ResViT (hybrid). 2.Pipeline: dataset split ‚Üí training ‚Üí evaluation (PR/ROC, confusion matrix, class-wise metrics) ‚Üí temperature scaling (reliability curves) ‚Üí export calibrated checkpoints. 3.XAI: Grad-CAM overlays for each model. For ResViT, there‚Äôs a toggle to view CAM from the CNN last conv or the ViT last block. Overlays can be downloaded as PNG. 4.App: Streamlit UI to test a single model or compare all three, with an optional ensemble (simple average). Upload limit raised to 500 MB to handle big images. 5.Repo polish: clean structure, CLI scripts, and all plots saved per-experiment under experiments/exp*/figs/. üé•Bumps I hit (and fixes)üé• 1.Labels looked ‚Äúswapped‚Äù (Normal ‚Üî Malignant). Root cause: class-order mismatch (training uses alphabetical folder order). Fix: auto class-order detection from evaluation.json + display-order selector in the app. 2.ModuleNotFoundError: pytorch_grad_cam. Streamlit was using a different Python than my conda env. Fix: install grad-cam from GitHub and launch with python -m streamlit from the torch_gpu env. 3.import src failing. Packaged the code (pyproject.toml) and installed editable via pip install -e .. 4.Upload cap stuck at 200 MB. Added .streamlit/config.toml with maxUploadSize = 500. 5.Git push rejected (remote ahead). Resolved via git fetch + git pull --rebase, then pushed new assets (incl. data.png & folder.png). üé•Try it locallyüé• conda create -n torch_gpu python=3.11 -y conda activate torch_gpu python -m pip install -e . python -m streamlit run app/streamlit_app.py 1.Upload checkpoints (best.pt or best_temp_scaled.pt) + a CT image 2.Flip ResViT CAM (CNN ‚Üî ViT) 3.Download Grad-CAM overlays as PNG 4.If predictions look ‚Äúoff‚Äù, upload evaluation.json to auto-map label order ‚Ä¶ more This is a modal window. No compatible source was found for this media. 11 reactions 11 Like Comment Repost Send Shah Nawaz ‚Ä¢ 2nd Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Computer Vision | AI 3mo ‚Ä¢ üöÄ Thrilled to Share My Achievement! üéâ I‚Äôm excited to announce that I have successfully completed the following courses from AWS Academy: üìò Machine Learning Foundations üí¨ Machine Learning for Natural Language Processing These courses have strengthened my understanding of core ML concepts and given me hands-on experience with real-world NLP applications ‚Äî from sentiment analysis to text classification using AWS services. A big thanks to AWS Academy for offering such high-quality and practical learning experiences! üîó Always open to new opportunities and collaborations in the fields of AI, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing. #AWSAcademy #MachineLearning #NLP #ArtificialIntelligence #LifelongLearning #Tech #AWS #DataScience #StudentToPro ‚Ä¶ more 1/2 13 reactions 13 1 comment Like Comment Repost Send Show all

name: Khaledur Rahman
headline: Co-Founder & CEO of Eminence Software limited | Health Tech| Building Health Care Solutions to bridge the gap between urban and rural healthcare
location: ‚ÄúHi Khaledur, it‚Äôs great to connect with you. Looking forward to staying in touch.‚Äù
about: Hello! Currently, I‚Äôm focused on solving urban‚Äìrural healthcare communication challenges through an AI-powered health tech ecosystem. The platform connects patients, doctors, and services in real time‚Äîbridging the gap between remote communities and medical support. I'm an entrepreneur and full-stack software developer with 10+ years of experience in building scalable web applications and API-driven platforms across industries like health tech, Real estate, Ad networks, food ordering, parcel delivery, and more. ‚Ä¶ more Activity 1,142 followers Posts Comments Images Khaledur Rahman reposted this Eminence Software Limited 583 followers 1mo ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ Thrilled to share of our recent meeting to finalize the plan for launching the Eminence Health Tech Portal! This platform is set to transform the healthcare landscape in Bangladesh and beyond. Our new portal, accessible via our website and mobile app, will feature a smart chatbot allowing patients to effortlessly book appointments. Crucially, a sophisticated AI agent will connect this system directly to our doctor portal, streamlining communications for both patients and doctors, especially through integrated video call capabilities. The final piece of the puzzle is the seamless integration of our prototype medical device. We were honored to have our business advisor, Mr. Tawhid Iqbal contribute his invaluable insights to the discussion. A huge thank you to our CEO, Khaledur Rahman and Co-founder, Sabnoor Aktar Shopno for their leadership, and to the Eminence Software team for their hard work. Get ready for a truly revolutionary step in digital health! #HealthTech #eminencesoftware #DigitalHealth #Innovation #Bangladesh #EminenceHealthTech #Healthcare ‚Ä¶ more 1/4 Khaledur Rahman and 46 others reacted Khaledur Rahman and 46 others 2 comments ‚Ä¢ 2 reposts Like Comment Repost Send Khaledur Rahman ‚Ä¢ 1st Co-Founder & CEO of Eminence Software limited | Health Tech| Building Health Care Solutions to bridge the gap between urban and rural healthcare 2mo ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ It has been a truly incredible experience meeting so many amazing people and teams at GITEX Digi Health Thailand. We've had the opportunity to share our knowledge, and in return, we've gained so much valuable feedback and experience. The response from people all over the world has been exceptional. We've received real, actionable feedback, and a great deal of interest in collaboration, including: * SaaS ecosystem partnerships from many countries. * Device collaboration partnerships. * Discussions with angel investors. * Inquiries from government, non-government, and individual organizations interested in our software solutions. * A tremendous amount of appreciation and interest from potential clients and partners. We're so grateful for the connections we've made and are looking forward to building on these relationships. We can't wait to work together more in the future! It was an incredible Journey with our Team, Eminence Software Limited: Co-Founder & Director Sabnoor Aktar Shopno Lead AI Engineer Rifat Ansari #innovation #gitex #helthTech #Investor #bangladesh #thailand #startupBangladesh #ChatBot #doctorBooking #ePrescription ‚Ä¶ more 1/7 56 reactions 56 2 reposts Like Comment Repost Send Khaledur Rahman reposted this MEDIAIPLUS 409 followers 2mo ‚Ä¢ üöÄ MEDIAIPLUS at GITEX DIGI HEALTH & BIOTECH Thailand 2025 ‚Äì Day 2 Recap Day 2 continued the momentum with inspiring global connections! üåç We connected with khaledur Rahman and Rifat Ansari from Eminence Software Limited, a fast-growing Bangladeshi company developing blood-based diagnostic solutions. With their strong commitment to initiating FDA-targeted clinical trials and openness to PoC collaborations in Korea and Japan, they represent a truly promising partner for long-term cooperation. We also met Raheel Zubairi, CEO of Pixelence, a health-tech company pioneering non-invasive MRI diagnostic solutions. With their strong ambition to enter the Korean market, we finalized an MOU and discussed next steps for clinical validation with CRO partners. Lastly, we engaged with Jane Supatcharapaun S. from Zuellig Pharma Thailand, a leading cold-chain logistics provider. They play a crucial role in supporting global clinical trial operations and shared opportunities for collaboration around sponsor-driven CRO needs. experience.title: Thrilled to share of our recent meeting to finalize the plan for launching the Eminence Health Tech Portal! This platform is set to transform the healthcare landscape in Bangladesh and beyond.

Our new portal, accessible via our website and mobile app, will feature a smart chatbot allowing patients to effortlessly book appointments. Crucially, a sophisticated AI agent will connect this system directly to our doctor portal, streamlining communications for both patients and doctors, especially through integrated video call capabilities. The final piece of the puzzle is the seamless integration of our prototype medical device.

We were honored to have our business advisor, Mr. Tawhid Iqbal contribute his invaluable insights to the discussion. A huge thank you to our CEO, Khaledur Rahman and Co-founder, Sabnoor Aktar Shopno for their leadership, and to the Eminence Software team for their hard work.
Get ready for a truly revolutionary step in digital health!
Co-Founder & CEO of Eminence Software limited | Health Tech| Building Health Care Solutions to bridge the gap between urban and rural healthcare

It has been a truly incredible experience meeting so many amazing people and teams at GITEX Digi Health Thailand. We've had the opportunity to share our knowledge, and in return, we've gained so much valuable feedback and experience.
The response from people all over the world has been exceptional. We've received real, actionable feedback, and a great deal of interest in collaboration, including:
* SaaS ecosystem partnerships from many countries.
* Inquiries from government, non-government, and individual organizations interested in our software solutions.
* A tremendous amount of appreciation and interest from potential clients and partners.
We're so grateful for the connections we've made and are looking forward to building on these relationships. We can't wait to work together more in the future!
It was an incredible Journey with our Team, Eminence Software Limited:
üöÄ MEDIAIPLUS at GITEX DIGI HEALTH & BIOTECH Thailand 2025 ‚Äì Day 2 Recap
Day 2 continued the momentum with inspiring global connections! üåç

We connected with khaledur Rahman and Rifat Ansari from Eminence Software Limited, a fast-growing Bangladeshi company developing blood-based diagnostic solutions. With their strong commitment to initiating FDA-targeted clinical trials and openness to PoC collaborations in Korea and Japan, they represent a truly promising partner for long-term cooperation.

We also met Raheel Zubairi, CEO of Pixelence, a health-tech company pioneering non-invasive MRI diagnostic solutions. With their strong ambition to enter the Korean market, we finalized an MOU and discussed next steps for clinical validation with CRO partners.

Lastly, we engaged with Jane Supatcharapaun S. from Zuellig Pharma Thailand, a leading cold-chain logistics provider. They play a crucial role in supporting global clinical trial operations and shared opportunities for collaboration around sponsor-driven CRO needs.
Day 2 reinforced the incredible potential of partnerships across Asia, with Thailand, Bangladesh, and beyond shaping the future of clinical research and digital health innovation.
Co-Founder & CEO of Eminence Software limited | Health Tech| Building Health Care Solutions to bridge the gap between urban and rural healthcare
We‚Äôre excited to share that at GITEX Digihealth Thailand, Eminence Software Limited took another big step toward building a complete digital healthcare ecosystem.
We have developed a prototype IoT device that can measure 6+ vital signs and instantly send the data to doctors, enabling faster and more accurate remote care.
To accelerate this journey, we have partnered with MEDIAIPLUS and signed an MoU for further collaboration, clinical validation, and future development.
Let‚Äôs work together to reshape the future of healthcare.
üåè Bridging üáßüá© Bangladesh & üá∞üá∑ Korea Through Health-Tech Innovation

We are proud to announce a strategic collaboration between Eminence Software Limited and MEDIAIPLUS, a leading #Korean health-tech innovator, during GITEX DIGI HEALTH & BIOTECH Thailand 2025. This partnership brings together #Eminence‚Äôs AI-driven, patient-centric health ecosystem with #MEDIAIPLUS advanced diagnostic technologies, aiming to transform healthcare accessibility across #Bangladesh, #Korea, and beyond.

Eminence Software Limited‚Äôs ecosystem combines intelligent portable devices, AI-driven health insights, e-prescription and online appointment management, an intelligent chatbot for patient interactions, and a SOS emergency response system. Together, these features enable real-time monitoring of vital signs, early detection of anomalies, seamless digital prescriptions, efficient appointment scheduling, and rapid emergency response, providing a fully integrated and patient-focused healthcare solution.

The collaboration was represented by key leaders and innovators from both organizations. From Eminence Software Limited, CEO khaledur Rahman, Co-Founder & Director Sabnoor Aktar Shopno, and Lead AI Engineer Rifat Ansari attended the event, showcasing our vision and technology. From #MEDIAIPLUS, Business Development Manager Chaneung Park and other team members joined, contributing their expertise and sharing insights into advanced healthcare solutions. Their presence highlights the strong professional partnership and shared commitment to cross-border healthcare innovation.

Through this collaboration, we are driving joint innovation and knowledge exchange, exploring clinical trials, proof-of-concept initiatives, and collaborative manufacturing to make non-invasive diagnostic solutions widely accessible. This partnership strengthens cross-border healthcare networks, aligns regulatory standards, and fosters a culture of research and innovation.

At its core, this collaboration is about impacting lives, enabling early detection, improving patient outcomes, and empowering healthcare providers with scalable, reliable solutions. By bridging Bangladesh and Korea, we are shaping a connected healthcare future and setting a model for global collaboration in health-tech innovation.
Co-Founder & CEO of Eminence Software limited | Health Tech| Building Health Care Solutions to bridge the gap between urban and rural healthcare
It was a privilege to take the stages GITEX DIGI HEALTH & BIOTECH and share how Eminence Health Tech product of Eminence Software Limited is bridging the healthcare gap between urban and rural areas.

In my talk, I highlighted the beautiful ecosystem we've built, which connects doctors, patients, and hospitals with seamless, integrated technology. For too long, people in rural communities have faced significant barriers to quality care. Our platform is changing that by providing a system that improves everything from diagnostics to patient management.
We‚Äôre not just building software; we‚Äôre creating a comprehensive solution that empowers healthcare professionals and gives patients the access they deserve.
Thank you, GITEX, for the incredible opportunity to share our journey and mission with the world. We are excited about what the future holds for health tech!
